mapper.insert: insert into message_1( cn_user_id, M_nc, M_sx, M_sr, M_xz, M_xx, M_zy, M_mail, M_phone, M_Note) values( #{cn_user_id}, #{M_nc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_sx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_sr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_xx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_zy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_Note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into message_2( cn_user_id, M_Rschool, M_stufaculty, M_stuProfession, M_jie, M_ban) values( #{cn_user_id}, #{M_Rschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_stufaculty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_stuProfession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_jie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{M_ban,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
